title: kApAli karuNai nilavu
sahitya:
kApAli karuNai nilavu pozhi vadanamadiyan oru


anupallavi

  A bAla gOpAlam Azhi shUzh talattavarum
 bhUpAlarum aSTadik pAlarum pOTrum adbhuta


caraNam    matipunal aravu konrai tumbai arugum mattaipunai mAshaDaiyAn
vidhi talaimAlai mArban uritta kariyin vempuliyin tOluDaiyAn
adhira muzhangum uDukkaiyum tirishUlamu ankiyum kurangamum ilangiDu kaiyAn
dyutimighu tirumEni muzhudum shAmba tulanga edir mangaiyar manam kavar jagan
mOana
